tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NN Thunder) (CC and) (NN lightning)) (VP (VBN used) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB scare) (NP (DT the) (NN shit)) (ADVP (IN out) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP me)))) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (JJ young))))))))) (. .)))
